metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15796 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Python-apt doesn't check if hashes are signed in `Version.fetch_binary()` and `Version.fetch_source()` of apt/package.py or in `_fetch_archives()` of apt/cache.py in version 1.9.3ubuntu2 and earlier. This allows downloads from unsigned repositories which shouldn't be allowed and has been fixed in verisions 1.9.5, 1.9.0ubuntu1.2, 1.6.5ubuntu0.1, 1.1.0~beta1ubuntu0.16.04.7, 0.9.3.5ubuntu3+esm2, and 0.8.3ubuntu7.5.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this requires a fix in aptdaemon also

criterions.comment: python-apt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
